channel.title: Lego Spiderman on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Lego Spiderman on Game6r

item.title: Lego Spiderman game
item.description: The Lego Spider-Man game offers you to control a hero created from a popular constructor. The unusual appearance did not limit the possibilities inherent in this amazing character. Spiderman can still launch webs (spacebar), move on the roofs and walls of skyscrapers, which allows him to skillfully move away from enemies. At the beginning of the game, hints in the form of red arrows will appear to help you navigate.
